turns.content: please prepare an itinerary for a 4 day trip with the 20 most recommended places (ranked atleast 4 in google) to visit with children (age 6 to 13) near chiang mai, make sure each place is up to 1-hour drive with car. each day add a places to do shopping and places to eat lunch and dinner (ranked atleast 4 in google not vegetarian restaurants), for each restaurant provide 3 recommended dishes. at the end of each day provide a place to do a foot massage (ranked at least 4 in google ) and eat dissert. please add to the itinerary a short description of each place, address, rank in google, opening hour, and the entry price of tickets for an adult and child.Share Prompt

Sure, here's a sample itinerary for a 4-day trip with the 20 most recommended places to visit with children near Chiang Mai:

Day 1:

1. Doi Suthep-Pui National Park - This national park is home to Doi Suthep, a mountain peak with a stunning temple on top. The park also offers hiking trails, waterfalls, and scenic views. Address: Tambon Su Thep, Amphoe Mueang Chiang Mai, Chang Wat Chiang Mai 50200, Thailand. Rank in Google: 4.6. Opening Hours: 6:00 AM - 6:00 PM. Entry price for an adult: 30 THB, child: 10 THB.
2. Huay Tung Tao Lake - This serene lake is a great spot for a picnic and offers paddle boat rentals. Address: Mae Rim, Chiang Mai, Thailand. Rank in Google: 4.5.
3. Chiang Mai Night Bazaar - This bustling market offers a variety of goods from souvenirs to clothes to street food. Address: Chang Khlan Rd, Tambon Chang Khlan, Amphoe Mueang Chiang Mai, Chang Wat Chiang Mai 50100, Thailand. Rank in Google: 4.1. Opening Hours: 6:00 PM - 12:00 AM.

Lunch: Khao Soi Mae Sai - Recommended dishes: Khao Soi, Fried Noodles with Pork, Fried Rice with Chicken. Address: 16 Rachadamnoen Rd Soi 5, Tambon Si Phum, Amphoe Mueang Chiang Mai, Chang Wat Chiang Mai 50200, Thailand. Rank in Google: 4.5.

Dinner: Dash! Teak House - Recommended dishes: Grilled Pork Neck, Stir-Fried Pork with Basil, Tom Yum Kung. Address: 38/2 Soi Ratchamanka 8, Tambon Phra Sing, Amphoe Mueang Chiang Mai, Chang Wat Chiang Mai 50200, Thailand. Rank in Google: 4.4.

Foot Massage: Lila Thai Massage - Rank in Google: 4.6. Opening Hours: 10:00 AM - 10:00 PM. Price for a foot massage: 250 THB.

Dessert: Mango Tango - Recommended dish: Mango Sticky Rice. Address: 5/5 Ratchadamnoen Rd Soi 5, Tambon Si Phum, Amphoe Mueang Chiang Mai, Chang Wat Chiang Mai 50200, Thailand. Rank in Google: 4.2.

Day 2:

1. Elephant Nature Park - This sanctuary is dedicated to rescuing and rehabilitating elephants from tourism and logging industries. Visitors can feed and bathe the elephants. Address: 209/2 Sridom Chai Road, Mae Rim, Chiang Mai 50180, Thailand. Rank in Google: 4.8. Opening Hours: 9:00 AM - 5:00 PM. Entry price for an adult: 3,500 THB, child: 1,750 THB.
2. Chiang Mai Zoo - This zoo is home to over 400 species of animals and offers a variety of exhibits, including a panda enclosure. Address: 100 Huay Kaew Road, Tambon Suthep, Amphoe Mueang Chiang Mai, Chang Wat Chiang Mai 50200, Thailand. Rank in Google: 4.1. Opening Hours: 8:00 AM - 5:00 PM. Entry price for an adult: 150 THB, child: 70 THB.
3.

Sure, here's a sample itinerary for a 4-day trip with the 20 most recommended places to visit with children near Chiang Mai:

Day 1:

1. Doi Suthep-Pui National Park - This national park is home to Doi Suthep, a mountain peak with a stunning temple on top. The park also offers hiking trails, waterfalls, and scenic views. Lunch: Khao Soi Mae Sai - Recommended dishes: Khao Soi, Fried Noodles with Pork, Fried Rice with Chicken. Address: 16 Rachadamnoen Rd Soi 5, Tambon Si Phum, Amphoe Mueang Chiang Mai, Chang Wat Chiang Mai 50200, Thailand. Rank in Google: 4.5.

Dinner: Dash! Teak House - Recommended dishes: Grilled Pork Neck, Stir-Fried Pork with Basil, Tom Yum Kung. Address: 38/2 Soi Ratchamanka 8, Tambon Phra Sing, Amphoe Mueang Chiang Mai, Chang Wat Chiang Mai 50200, Thailand. Rank in Google: 4.4.

Foot Massage: Lila Thai Massage - Rank in Google: 4.6. Opening Hours: 10:00 AM - 10:00 PM. Price for a foot massage: 250 THB.

Dessert: Mango Tango - Recommended dish: Mango Sticky Rice. Address: 5/5 Ratchadamnoen Rd Soi 5, Tambon Si Phum, Amphoe Mueang Chiang Mai, Chang Wat Chiang Mai 50200, Thailand. Rank in Google: 4.2.

Day 2:

1. Elephant Nature Park - This sanctuary is dedicated to rescuing and rehabilitating elephants from tourism and logging industries. Visitors can feed and bathe the elephants. Address: 209/2 Sridom Chai Road, Mae Rim, Chiang Mai 50180, Thailand. Rank in Google: 4.8. Opening Hours: 9:00 AM - 5:00 PM. Entry price for an adult: 3,500 THB, child: 1,750 THB.
2. Chiang Mai Zoo - This zoo is home to over 400 species of animals and offers a variety of exhibits, including a panda enclosure. Address: 100 Huay Kaew Road, Tambon Suthep, Amphoe Mueang Chiang Mai, Chang Wat Chiang Mai 50200, Thailand. Rank in Google: 4.1. Opening Hours: 8:00 AM - 5:00 PM. Entry price for an adult: 150 THB, child: 70 THB.
3.

3. Art in Paradise - This museum features interactive 3D art exhibits that allow visitors to become a part of the artwork. Address: 199/9 Changklan Rd, Tambon Chang Khlan, Amphoe Mueang Chiang Mai, Chang Wat Chiang Mai 50100, Thailand. Rank in Google: 4.3. Opening Hours: 9:00 AM - 9:00 PM. Entry price for an adult: 400 THB, child: 200 THB.

Lunch: SP Chicken - Recommended dishes: Grilled Chicken, Fried Chicken, Tom Yum Noodle Soup. Address: 4-6 Soi Ratchamanka 6, Tambon Phra Sing, Amphoe Mueang Chiang Mai, Chang Wat Chiang Mai 50200, Thailand. Rank in Google: 4.4.

Dinner: The Riverside Bar & Restaurant - Recommended dishes: Pad Thai, Massaman Curry, Grilled Pork Ribs. Address: 9-11 Charoenrat Rd, Tambon Wat Ket, Amphoe Mueang Chiang Mai, Chang Wat Chiang Mai 50000, Thailand. Rank in Google: 4.3.

Foot Massage: Fah Lanna Spa - Rank in Google: 4.6. Opening Hours: 10:00 AM - 10:00 PM. Price for a foot massage: 300 THB.

Dessert: Bake & Bite - Recommended dish: Chocolate Lava Cake. Address: 56/2 Ratchamanka Rd, Tambon Phra Sing, Amphoe Mueang Chiang Mai, Chang Wat Chiang Mai 50200, Thailand. Rank in Google: 4.4.

Day 3:

1. Doi Inthanon National Park - This national park is home to Thailand's highest peak and offers hiking trails, waterfalls, and scenic views. Address: Ban Luang, Chom Thong District, Chiang Mai 50160, Thailand. Rank in Google: 4.6. Opening Hours: 6:00 AM - 6:00 PM. Entry price for an adult: 300 THB, child: 150 THB.
2. Baan Tawai Village - This village is known for its handicrafts and offers a variety of items such as wood carvings, textiles, and pottery. Address: 130/1 Moo 1, T. Tonpao, A. San Kamphaeng, Chiang Mai 50130, Thailand. Rank in Google: 4.3.
3. Mae Sa Elephant Camp - This camp offers elephant shows, elephant rides, and elephant feeding. Address: 119/9, Tambon Mae Sa, Amphoe Mae Rim, Chang Wat Chiang Mai 50180, Thailand. Rank in Google: 4.3. Opening Hours: 8:00 AM - 5:00 PM. Entry price for an adult: 2,400 THB, child: 1,200 THB.

Lunch: The Salad Concept - Recommended dishes: Caesar Salad, Tom Yum Soup, Pad Thai. Address: 14 Nimmana Haeminda Rd Lane 1, Tambon Su Thep, Amphoe Mueang Chiang Mai, Chang Wat Chiang Mai 50200, Thailand. Rank in Google: 4.5.

Dinner: The Good View Bar & Restaurant - Recommended dishes: BBQ Pork Ribs, Pad Thai, Tom Yum Kung. Address: 13 Charoenrat Rd, Tambon Wat Ket, Amphoe Mueang Chiang Mai, Chang Wat Chiang Mai 50000, Thailand. Rank in Google: 4.3.
